alert.note: Alert for Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 2:58AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky including the following counties, Logan, Simpson, and Warren. * WHEN...Until 400 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 156 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowling Green, Russellville, Plum Springs, Memphis Junction, Crestmoor, Mount Victor, Anderson, Auburn, Lewisburg, and Smiths Grove. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Flooding is especially dangerous in the dark.
